 Software DeveloperView Job Description | Rasbor We are hiring to build a very strong technical team for the growth of our organization. We offer a veryfriendly and encouraging atmosphere for you to ideate and develop your skills. You will be workingwith very qualified and experienced pool of people,  who will guide you through for a kick start of yourcareer. You will have to collaborate with the Project Manager to understand clients businessrequirements. You will be responsible for delivering solutions to real world e-commerce andm-commerce problems. You will be required to work in a team and should have strong inter-personalskills with ability to work deliver.
  KEY RESPONSIBILITIES 

Work with client and project Manager on the work package effort estimation 
Develop customized eCommerce and mCommercesolutions 
Reverse engineer for debugging errors in code 
Confirm project requirements by reviewing program objective,  input data,  and output requirementswith analyst,  supervisor,  and client. 
Arrange project requirements in programming sequence by analyzing requirements; preparing a workflow diagram /  documentation 
Programming Testing of the Code written to perform what is needed to be accomplished by thecode. 
Documentation reference preparation for users by writing operating instructions including changesdocumentation historical records revisions. 
Contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.   ESSENTIAL SKILLS 

Have already coded as a part of student project equal to 1 years of experience in Industry. 
Desire to make BIG in professional career. 
Quick learner and keen eye for detail. 
Passionate and driven for learning new technologies. 
Concepts of MySQL database. 
Passionate and driven for learning new technologies.   DESIRED SKILLS 

Excellent verbal and written communication skills,  such as meeting facilitation,  presentation anddocumentation. 
Well-developed organizational and interpersonal communications skills. 
Ability to handle multiple,  competing priorities,  meet deadlines,  manage risk,  and troubleshootproblems. 
Have strong collaboration and influencing skills. 
Knowledge of eCommerce web development. 
Strong understanding of web technologies,  usability,  information architecture,  and browsercompatibility issues. 
Knowledge of basis data management,  database concepts,  database-driven Web applications.  Masters or Bachelors Degree in Computer/ IT.
PG: Post Graduation Not Required, MCA in Computers
